titleStmt.title: The boke named the royall
Somme des vices et vertus. English
titleStmt.author: Laurent, Dominican, fl. 1279.
Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

publicationStmt.publisher: In fletestrete at the sygne of ye sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by William Caxton, of: Laurent. Somme des vices et vertus.
Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
